attributes.action: statue made of Captain Tom Moore, to symbolise his hero status.
attributes.additional_details: Because he has done more to raise moral and money than the government ministers who are paid to do the job.
attributes.background: To recognise the work and hero status of this great man, who has raised money for the NHS through the Covid crisis of 2020.

rejection.details: This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for. The erection of a statue would a matter for the local authority wherever the statue was to be located.
